original: Araṇaṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam parittam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na parittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
